Feature.Name: Hungry
Feature.Text: This item's magical properties function only if fresh blood from a humanoid has been applied to it within the past 24 hours. It needs only a drop to activate.

MagicProperty.Name: Quirk - Hungry
MagicProperty.Description: This item's magical properties function only if fresh blood from a humanoid has been applied to it within the past 24 hours. It needs only a drop to activate.
